sense.def:
To return to a place
pomeni spet iti nekam.

seg.quote: He returned home several hours later.
Her husband left for work one morning and did not return.

sense.def:
One's return
je človekov prihod nazaj na določen kraj.

seg.quote: On his return Haldane reported to the Cabinet.

sense.def:
To return something
pomeni, da nekaj, kar smo vzeli ali si izposodili, damo nazaj.

seg.quote: We returned the books to the shelf.
He borrowed my best suit and didn't return it.

sense.def:
The return of something
je to, da nekaj vrnemo.

seg.quote: Greece will be offered the return of these treasures as a goodwill gift.

sense.def:
To return something
pomeni, da naredimo enako kot druga oseba, na primer da na nasmeh odgovorimo z nasmehom.
To return someone's feelings
pomeni, da do neke osebe čutimo enako kot ona do nas.

seg.quote: She was looking for somebody to return her affection.

sense.def:
Kadar občutek ali položaj
returns
, se spet pojavi.

seg.quote: If the pain returns, the treatment is repeated.
After nine months, the rains returned.

sense.def:
The return of a feeling or situation
je ponovna pojavitev občutkov ali okoliščin.

To return to a subject
pomeni spet začeti govoriti o določeni stvari.
To return to an activity
pomeni spet začeti nekaj delati.

seg.quote: We shall return to this theme in Chapter 7.
After lunch, Edward returned to his gardening.

sense.def:
To return to a state one was in before
pomeni, da človek začne spet biti takšen, kakršen je bil prej.

seg.quote: ...the groans of wounded men returning to consciousness.

sense.def:
The return to a former state
je sprememba okoliščin v prejšnje stanje.

seg.quote: He referred to the Party's hopes for a return to power.

sense.def:
A return
ali
a return ticket
je vozovnica, s katero lahko potujemo do izbranega kraja in nazaj.

The return on an investment
je dobiček, ki ga prinese naložba.

seg.quote: Companies seek higher returns by investing in other corporations.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
in return for something else
, tisto naredimo zato, ker je nekdo drug naredil nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: They had nothing to give in return.

sense.def:
Z besedami
many happy returns
čestitamo nekomu, ki ima rojstni dan.

Kadar nekdo doseže
the point of no return
, mora tisto, kar počne, delati še naprej, ker je prepozno, da bi tisto prekinil.

cit.quote: točka brez vrnitve; točka, s katere ni več poti nazaj
